title: @RiotRepertoir : We need to level Courage to get maximum AR/MR???
body: wheren't we told we DIDN'T need to put any more than a single point into Courage to reach the maximum AR and MR?

replies.body: Nope, there was just a mix-up between Scarizard and me in updating the patch notes for this particular line.

We should probably wait a while. Its quite possibly something that was just not communicated internally when writing up the notes.

(These things have happened before)

> [{quoted}](name=LoLKiru,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEzZMziQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-19T19:44:34.193+0000)
>
> We should probably wait a while. Its quite possibly something that was just not communicated internally when writing up the notes.
> 
> (These things have happened before)

It wasn't changed in the beta so I doubt they would just change it back for no exact reason.

> [{quoted}](name=Inept Maverick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEzZMziQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T19:50:11.961+0000)
>
> It wasn't changed in the beta so I doubt they would just change it back for no exact reason.

Yeah, thats what I'm saying.

Its probably still the way it was on the PBE, they just didn't tell them that when he wrote the notes (basically, they probably wrote the notes off of old values for some sections).
